PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ReinforcementBarPitchOfSlab
PropertySetDef.Definition: The pitch length information of reinforcement bar with the slab.

PropertyDef.Name: Description
PropertyDef.Definition: The description of the air side system.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), Also referred to as "construction type". It should be provided as an alternative to the name of the "object type", if the software does not support object types.

PropertyDef.Name: LongOutsideTopBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the long outside top bar.

PropertyDef.Name: LongInsideCenterTopBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the long inside center top bar.

PropertyDef.Name: LongInsideEndTopBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the long inside end top bar.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortOutsideTopBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the short outside top bar.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortInsideCenterTopBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the short inside center top bar.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortInsideEndTopBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the short inside end top bar.

PropertyDef.Name: LongOutsideLowerBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the long outside lower bar.

PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the long inside center lower bar.

PropertyDef.Name: LongInsideEndLowerBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the long inside end lower bar.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortOutsideLowerBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the short outside lower bar.
